title: Revenue Growth — CoinUsUp + Even Us Up

title: Signal App — Fast Track Launch

title: OpenClaw Maintenance — Reduce Toil
description: Ongoing maintenance of OpenClaw infrastructure. Currently assessing priority areas.

title: Consulting Work — Keep Revenue Stable
description: Maintain current load (no growth, no shrink). Use projects as research for productization ideas.
